meta.on_failure: halt current execution, analyze blocker, rewrite tasks.json with new path, resume execution loop

tasks.description: Read CONSTITUTION/omega-index.md and ingest Security and Quality protocols via GitHub MCP. **HARD VERIFICATION REQUIRED**: Do not proceed to T002 unless you have explicitly matched and loaded the 'OMEGA_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_v10' string from the remote SECURITY.xml file into your active context window.
Run omega.py prompt generator to establish USER SPACE structure.
Generate Next.js scaffolding in USER SPACE/project/src with Supabase DB layout.
Flatten the generated src code using compressor.py and verify against Security rules.
